definition: affable/kindly
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
pleased

sentences.english: That evening when she entered the theatre the manager had a most pleasant greeting for her.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，當她走進戲院時，經理極其和悅地招呼她。

sentences.english: "Is Mr. Drouet in?" said Hurstwood blandly.
sentences.chinese: “杜洛埃先生在家嗎？”赫斯渥和悅地說。

sentences.english: After Sun Yat-sen visited back and Yuet Chau.
sentences.chinese: 孫中山視察過後，回到和悅洲。

sentences.english: When she speaks, she remains pleasant-faced and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 說話的時候，她一直保持和悅的表情，一直在微笑。

sentences.english: The amenity of his manners won him many friends.
sentences.chinese: 他和悅的態度替他贏得很多朋友。

sentences.english: It also made the people happy to hear the friendly birds singing.
sentences.chinese: 聽到鳥兒和悅的歌聲，人們也很快活。

definition: (literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
light intellectual conversation
to pass on the light of Buddha
feast/celebration
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Jiangle county in Sanming 三明[San1 ming2], Fujian
sky clears after rain/new hopes after a disastrous period (idiom)/every cloud has a silver lining (idiom)/see also 雨過天晴|雨过天晴[yu3 guo4 tian1 qing2]
to praise/to compliment
to perform a sword-dance
loyal/sincere/sound
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
elated/light and airy feeling (after a few drinks)/smug and conceited/complacent
lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education
(old) commanding general/commander-in-chief/(Qing dynasty) title for a governor-general (provincial military governor) 總督|总督[zong3 du1]
a wish/a request (to a deity)
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
